title: The Paris Caper
description: This book is now titled IN HIS CONTROL. Please see the new product description for that title. Librarian's note: This is an alternate cover edition for ASIN: B007BKAGVU.Formerly The French Detective's WomanA rogue detective will do anything to catch the sexy international thief he's fixated upon. When their titillating game of cat and mouse grows shockingly intimate, he must make the impossible choice between honor and duty...and the notorious woman he has unwittingly come to love.
author: Nina Bruhns
